name: INJECTION (Michilinki)
description:
INSTRUCTION
=========== 
Keep the G-Ball population in ballance with injection combinations to keep the a core from another dimension alive and earn money!
 
Professor Klux will always support you with his special charm.
 
  
HOW TO PLAY
===========
- WATCH THE POPULATION OF THE G-BALLS.
- WATCH THE E-BLOCKS WHITCH SUPPORT YOU WITH INJECTION POWER.
- COMPARE THE NUMBER OF THE COLORED BLOCKS WITH THE MATCHING G-BALLS.
- REDUCE THE BLOCKS BEFORE THEY REACH THE TOP. 
- WITHOUT ENERGY THE "BIG BUMPER" WILL BE HELPFUL.
- COMBINE INJECTIONS TO CONTROL THE G-BALL POPULATION.  
- BEAR PROFESSOR KLUX CAPRICIOUS SAYINGS! (SOMETIMES HELPFUL)
 
NOTE:
=====
G-Balls have a short lifetime away from the CORE.
 
HOW TO CONTROL:
=============== 
- MOUSE - 
 
LEFT/RIGHT BUTTON  -   SELECT INJECTIONS/BIG BUMPER
TURN MOUSE WHEEL   -   SURROUND THE CORE
PRESS MOUSE WHEEL  -   INJECTION / BIG BUMPER
CAMERA/ AIMING     -   MOUSE MOVE
 
- KEYBOARD -
 
"X"                -   INJECTION / BIG BUMPER
"R"                -   RESET CAMERA
"W A S D"          -   CHANGE POSITION
"ESC"              -   MENU
 
- CONTROLLER -
(In development)
